entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 4.8°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain mixed with wet snow this evening. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 6:02 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except south 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 6:02 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 6:02 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
